# Configuration for hs_cleanup.
# need to be defined.
duration_seconds=90,
cache_size_mb=200,
enable_logging=true,
statistics_config=
(
    type=all,
    enable_logging=true
),
metrics_monitor=
(
    cache_hs_insert=
    (
        min=10,
        max=100000000,
        postrun=true,
        save=true,
    ),
    cc_pages_removed=
    (
        max=10000000,
        postrun=true,
        save=true,
    ),
    stat_cache_size=
    (
        max=100,
        runtime=true,
    ),
    stat_db_size=
    (
        #10GB
        max=10000000000,
        runtime=true,
        save=true,
    ),
),
timestamp_manager=
(
    enabled=true,
    oldest_lag=5,
    op_rate=1s,
    stable_lag=5
),
workload_manager=
(
    checkpoint_config=
    (
        op_rate=20s,
    ),
    populate_config=
    (
        collection_count=10,
        key_count_per_collection=500,
        key_size=100,
        thread_count=10,
        value_size=10000
    ),
    update_config=
    (
        op_rate=10ms,
        # Be careful to not aim too high with this config, if we fill the dirty cache and
        # all threads are trying to update, they'll get pulled into eviction and will get stuck.
        ops_per_transaction=(max=20,min=0),
        thread_count=10,
        value_size=10000
    )
),
operation_tracker=
(
    enabled=true,
    op_rate=30s
)
